name: chi_square_independence_test
description: Performs a Chi-Square test for independence on a 2x2 contingency table. The function returns the test statistic, p-value, degrees of freedom, expected values, and the result of the hypothesis test based on the significance level.

contingency_table.description: A 2x2 contingency table containing the observed frequencies.

significance_level.description: The significance level for the Chi-Square test. This value is used to determine whether to reject the null hypothesis.
